about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of strategic competition in Pyradice, a casual game that challenges your skill and cunning.

Conquer the pyramid!

In Pyradice you claim the valuable stones of the pyramid turn by turn to be chosen as its ruler upon completion. But you are not alone: your opponents also fight for the sought-after stones, making it a tricky balance of risk and reward - because if two players claim the same stones, both walk away empty-handed!

Plan your strategy and execute it wisely!

With each roll of the dice new stone combinations become possible, which each player can claim. Simultaneously with all other players, covertly choose the stones that you feel have the best odds. Higher levels and older stones yield more points but also carry a higher risk of other players having the same idea.

Play alone or in a large group!

Pyradice offers flexible game modes that allow you to play by yourself, with friends or even with players from all over the world. Offline, you can compete against AI opponents and test the waters before taking on bigger challenges. Online, you can either organize private matches with friends or compete with strangers. The game is designed for up to 12 players and unfolds its full dynamics with as few as three players, whether they are human or AI. Even online, open slots can easily be filled with AI opponents, ensuring the enjoyment of the game at all times.

Are you ready to conquer the pyramid?

Pyradice combines strategic thinking, clever planning and the thrill of competition. Plan wisely to secure the most valuable stones and skillfully outplay your opponents. Become the master of pyramid building and declare yourself the true ruler of Pyradice!
